name: Greedy Drilly
description:
Your little drill head will dig gold madly.

He always goes vertically after horizontally.

You can block traps will mouse click by using 2 gold each.

When you stopped, your level is the score, and then press R to restart.

*IMPORTANT

*Setting size of browser to 67% on my chrome makes it possible to play with odd UI.

UI is big to edge, because I was testing on my chrome, which is wired. Should have tested on edge I guess.
